LanguageData.MakeThreshingRiceMillingMachine200N.labe: Thoroughly thresh Inaho into White rice (200)
LanguageData.MakeThreshingRiceMillingMachine200N.desc: Make Inaho into White rice. The by-product is crushed and disappears.
LanguageData.MakeThreshingRiceMillingMachineGR200N.la: Thoroughly thresh Inaho into Glutinous rice (200)

LanguageData.MakeThreshingRiceMillingMachineBR200N.la: Thoroughly thresh Inaho into Brown rice (200)

LanguageData.MakeThreshingRiceMillingMachine200C.labe: Cautiously thresh Inaho into White rice (200)
LanguageData.MakeThreshingRiceMillingMachine200C.desc: Make Inaho into White rice. The by-product bag is replaced by a small amount of chemfuel.

LanguageData.MakeThreshingRiceMillingMachine10.descri: Inaho is divided into White rice, Straw, Outer hull, and Rice bran.
